name: THEADICTECHNOGAME
description:
Made for the song One Finger (Tom Hades Remix), a fast pacing hypnotic blasting interactive techno music video experience.

An old school space racer game for the sake
of the song and the game itself.

Available for Desktop, Oculus DK2 and Fulldome (mac with Blendy Dome VJ).

Play with X-Box 360 controller! Install mac drivers first.

Why DK2 only? I built it when it was the only HMD available, with Unity 4. I have no idea if it will work with the current devices.
